name: aframe-physics-system
description: Physics system for A-Frame VR, built on Cannon.js

scripts.dist: browserify browser.js -o dist/aframe-physics-system.js && uglifyjs -c -o dist/aframe-physics-system.min.js -- dist/aframe-physics-system.js
scripts.version: npm run dist && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Don McCurdy <dm@donmccurdy.com> (https://www.donmccurdy.com)
